about_the_game:
Decorum is set in a retro-futuristic uchronia, inspired by late-19th century Europe. This world is a grand display of mechanical wonders and oppressive control. Yet, beneath the grandeur of the World’s Fair, not all machines are content to serve their purpose.

Being a decommissioned worker robot, you must weave through ornate halls, sneak past eerie mechanical sentinels, and decipher the secrets of the Exhibition. Blend in among the unaware, feign obedience, and use distractions to avoid suspicion as you search for a path to freedom.

But beware—this grand spectacle hides more than just wondrous inventions…


In the darkest corners of the Exhibition, something watches…

Decorum is a compact yet emotionally profound adventure that challenges both the mind and heart. Lose yourself in a breathtaking steampunk world, where mystery and mechanical marvels intertwine.

Key Features:

  • A Handcrafted Retro-Futuristic World – Step into a breathtaking 19th-century exhibition where intricate machinery meets elegant Victorian architecture, creating a mesmerizing blend of past and future.

  • Stealth and Deception – Navigate through dimly lit halls, evade relentless guards, and use your wits to blend into the world of mechanical wonders.

  • Intricately Designed Art Direction – Every detail, from lavish pavilions to the eerie yet majestic automata, is hand-drawn to immerse you in a one-of-a-kind visual journey.

  • A Hauntingly Beautiful Soundscape – A carefully composed soundtrack and rich ambient sound design transport you into a world of mystery and tension.

Will you remain a mere cog in this grand mechanical spectacle, or will you defy your fate and escape into the unknown?

The choice is yours in Decorum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
